name: Necramech Summon
description: Summon a Necramech to the battlefield.

languages.description: Rufe einen Necramech auf das Schlachtfeld.
languages.name: Necramech-Ruf

languages.description: Invoquez un Necramech sur le champ de bataille.
languages.name: Déploiement de Necramech

languages.description: Evoca un Necramech sul campo di battaglia.
languages.name: Richiamo Necramech

languages.description: Invoca un Necramech al campo de batalla.
languages.name: Invocador de Necramech

languages.description: 召唤一架殁世机甲到战场上。
languages.name: 召唤殁世机甲

languages.description: 戦いの場にネクロメカを召喚する。
languages.name: ネクロメカ ランチャー

languages.description: Invoca um Necramech para o campo de batalha.
languages.name: Invocador de Necramech

languages.description: 在戰場上召喚一架亡骸機甲。
languages.name: 召喚亡骸機甲

languages.description: เรียก Necramech ออกมาสู่สมรภูมิรบ
languages.name: เรียก Necramech ออกมา
